original_title: Alice Sara Ott Live in Yellow Lounge: Nightfall
overview: The Yellow Lounge is nowhere more true to its reputation of bringing classical music to unusual spaces than here in the stunning setting inside MORI Building Digital Art Museum in Tokyo. Pianist Alice Sara Ott as well as cellist Mischa Maisky perform repertoire from Debussy, Satie, Saint-SaÃ«ns and Massenet.
title: Alice Sara Ott Live in Yellow Lounge: Nightfall
